General.Name: Shenzhen Longtech Smart Control Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shenzhen Longtech Smart Control Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sales of intelligent controllers and intelligent products. Its products are used in home appliances, automotive electronics, consumer electronics, and other smart controllers, as well as off-grid lighting. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Shenzhen, China.

2.Name: Mr. Bao Fa  Zhao
2.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board
